title: Matchsafe
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Figure of seated man wearing Near Eastern outfit with orange coat, white short pants with light blue stripes and green waistcoat. Figure smokes long narrow black pipe. Figure wears white turban with red and blue stripes.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe.
Porcelain. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1982-23-317.
